sentences: Jaroslav Erno Šedivý (born Jaroslav Šedivý on 15 October 1947, Prague, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech rock drummer.
He was member of The Primitives Group, thereafter Flamengo (Kuře v hodinkách) and also Energit (briefly in 1973).
In 1973 he emigrated to the United States, where he worked with a most groups including Jello Biafra's backing band and Invisible Pedestrian.
Between 1974-1979 he lived in various towns in California and between 1979-1980 in New York.
In 1990s he was member of Life After Life with another Czech emigrant Jim Čert.
